mapper.select: SELECT RDATE, COUNT(RTIME) "RTIME" FROM RESERVE WHERE MEMBERID= #{memberId} AND RTYN='Y' AND RCODE='S' GROUP BY RDATE ORDER BY RDATE DESC
SELECT SUM(TPRICENO)-SUM(TUSENO) "TYN" FROM TICKET WHERE TCODE='S' AND TYN='Y' AND MEMBERID= #{memberId}

SELECT RDATE, COUNT(RTIME) "RTIME" FROM RESERVE WHERE MEMBERID= #{memberId} AND RTYN='Y' AND RCODE='S' AND SUBSTR(RDATE,1,2) LIKE SUBSTR(#{year},3,2) AND SUBSTR(RDATE,4,2) LIKE #{month} GROUP BY RDATE ORDER BY RDATE DESC
SELECT TNO, TDATE, TPRICENO, TPRICENO*800 "TUSENO", TPRICENO-TUSENO "TCODE" FROM TICKET WHERE TCODE='S' AND MEMBERID= #{memberId} ORDER BY TNO DESC
SELECT RDATE, COUNT(RTIME) "RTIME" FROM RESERVE WHERE MEMBERID= #{memberId} AND RTYN='Y' AND RCODE='H' GROUP BY RDATE ORDER BY RDATE DESC
SELECT SUM(TPRICENO)-SUM(TUSENO) "TYN" FROM TICKET WHERE TCODE='H' AND TYN='Y' AND MEMBERID= #{memberId}

SELECT RDATE, COUNT(RTIME) "RTIME" FROM RESERVE WHERE MEMBERID= #{memberId} AND RTYN='Y' AND RCODE='H' AND SUBSTR(RDATE,1,2) LIKE SUBSTR(#{year},3,2) AND SUBSTR(RDATE,4,2) LIKE #{month} GROUP BY RDATE ORDER BY RDATE DESC
SELECT TNO, TDATE, TPRICENO, TPRICENO*800 "TUSENO", TPRICENO-TUSENO "TCODE" FROM TICKET WHERE TCODE='H' AND MEMBERID= #{memberId} ORDER BY TNO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TICKET VALUES(TICKET_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{tPriceNo}, DEFAULT, 'S', DEFAULT, #{memberId})
INSERT INTO TICKET VALUES(TICKET_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{tPriceNo}, DEFAULT, 'H', DEFAULT, #{memberId})
mapper.update: UPDATE MONTHPAY SET MPTYN='N' WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT MPNO, MPDATE, TRUNC(MPDATE,'MM') || ' ~ ' || LAST_DAY(MPDATE) "MEMBERID", TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS( TRUNC(MPDATE,'MM'), 1 ),'YYYY-MM-DD') "NEXTPAY" , MPMEANS, MPTYN, MPPRICE FROM MONTHPAY WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId} ORDER BY MPNO DESC

SELECT ACNO, ACDATE, TO_CHAR( ACPRICE , '999,999,999,999,999') "ACPRICE", ACBIG, ACSMALL, ACINOUT FROM ACCOUNT WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId} AND ACDATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM') AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) ORDER BY ACDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACCOUNT WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId} AND ACDATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM') AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)

SELECT COUNT(RDATE)*1000 "RDATE" FROM RESERVE WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId} AND RTYN='N' AND RDATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM') AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(TPRICENO)*800 FROM TICKET WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId} AND TDATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM') AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) UNION ALL SELECT NVL(MAX(MPPRICE),0) FROM MONTHPAY WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId} AND MPDATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM') AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)

SELECT NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ACINOUT='in' THEN ACPRICE END),0) "ACIN", NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN ACINOUT='out' THEN ACPRICE END),0) "ACOUT" FROM ACCOUNT WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId} AND ACDATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM') AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)

SELECT ACNO, ACDATE, TO_CHAR( ACPRICE , '999,999,999,999,999') "ACPRICE", ACBIG, ACSMALL, ACINOUT FROM ACCOUNT WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId} AND ACDATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM') AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) ORDER BY ACDATE DESC
